scripts.Compile & run Dev: rm ./client/public/javascript/* && rm ./client/public/stylesheets/* && coffee -c -m -o ./client/scripts/ ./client/scripts/*.coffee && uglifyjs -m -c --output ./client/public/javascript/saturn.js --source-map sourcemap.js.map --in-source-map ./client/scripts/*.js.map ./client/scripts/*.js && rm ./client/scripts/*.js* && lessc --source-map ./client/style/style.less ./client/style/style.css && cleancss --source-map --compatibility=ie8 --keep-line-breaks --output ./client/public/stylesheets/stylemin.css ./client/style/style.css && rm ./client/style/style.css* && mv ./sourcemap.js.map ./client/public/javascript/ && node ./server/bin/start_server
scripts.Compile & run Production: rm ./client/public/javascript/* && rm ./client/public/stylesheets/* && coffee -c -o ./client/scripts/ ./client/scripts/*.coffee && uglifyjs -m -c --output ./client/public/javascript/saturn.js ./client/scripts/*.js && rm ./client/scripts/*.js && lessc ./client/style/style.less ./client/style/style.css && cleancss --compatibility=ie8 --keep-line-breaks --output ./client/public/stylesheets/stylemin.css ./client/style/style.css && rm ./client/style/style.css && node ./server/bin/start_server
